title: Scenario ONE
description: This is the description of scenario ONE in course ONE

steps.title: Step 1 - Introduction
steps.text: Welcome to Scenario ONE. This scenario will guide you through setting up a basic environment using Kali Linux.

steps.title: Step 2 - Verify Environment
steps.text: Run `lsb_release -a` to verify the Kali Linux environment.

steps.title: Step 3 - Install Tools
steps.text: Run the following command to install additional tools: `apt update && apt install -y vim curl net-tools`.
steps.code: apt update && apt install -y vim curl net-tools
